item.title: Welcome
item.description: Welcome to the course. The purpose of this course is to cover the following topics: How to critically read and write a research project How to plan and design your health related research project How to obtain and analyse data Learn how to clean or preprocess data Basic data analyses using dplyr, ggplot Conduct statistical data modelling Publish your work The format of the class will be in the form of discussions and hands on learning.
